page.title: 18RACHELLE'S HOME.
page.content: My house has a toilet, & a bathroom which has a bath, a basin and another toilet. We have three bedrooms where we sleep. My father works shifts in the paper mill. The kitchen is where we keep all our food- in the refrigerator & cupboards. There is a sink with running water & an electric cooker. The washing machine is in there. The sitting room is where we watch television, from the three piece suite. We also have a dining table and units.There are stairs to go up to the bedrooms. When we go to the shops in Sittingbourne we go by car, but there is a bus. Our car has a petrol engine & in June 1985 petrol is Â£2 a gallon.Our car goes about 35 miles on one gallon. We like to do our shopping at a shopping centre, but there is one shop near my home in Rodmersham. Our house has a garden & I help in it.
